A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bold new direction for Star Wars. It tests us by asking us\, who can be a hero [anyone]\, and  what is hope. Led by dynamic performances particularly Adam Driver\, this sci-fi space epic is in the stars.  Despite some plot holes and canned dialogue the film packs a punch. To the fans who critique it for being different\, difference is hard\, but in some cases like this one it works.
